title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft Viva â€“  Dashboard in Viva Insights to become available with Copilot for Microsoft 365
description: In the coming months, the Microsoft Copilot Dashboard will become available to all Copilot for Microsoft 365 customers at no additional cost and will not require a Viva or Viva Insights license. Users will be able to access the dashboard in the Viva Insights app in Microsoft Teams or the web app.
